name: Rock Paper Scissors with Shelly
description:
This game is simply Rock Paper Scissors with a spooky atmosphere. In this game, you click on the item you wish to play and on the count of three, the round starts as fast as it begins and the winner gets a point! The first to 2 is the winner! Your opponent is Shelly, a ghost girl that is obsessed with this game and has chosen you to be her challenger. If she enjoys your company, you might have another chance!

If you survive, you will notice the light flicker, dimming and particles giving some life to the dimly lit room. Alongside some subtle sound effects to portray the round results and Shelly's mood towards you. 

Controls:

Click on the Rock, Paper or Scissors that are on the table.
